demala sandhanaye hitapu parlimenthu manthri nadaraja rawiraj mahatha ghathanaya kirime chodana yatathe nawika hamuda samajikayin thidenek aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wisin athadanguwata gena prashna karamin sitiyi.
gowi mahathunta parani gowikama handunwadiya hakke kolambaa deshana ha sammanthrana pawathwimen nowa prayogika wa gowi mahathun kara yameni.
kese wethath nonagathayehi aparardhayehi api suba mohothen lipa gini dalwamu, wada allamu.
tayar sa matha bageta pilissuna malasiruru ballange dainika aahara wela sarikaraliya.
samastha-yuropiya ratawal athurin satharawana wishalathama rataya, yukrenaya, pranshaya saha spanynyayata dewani.
ee wathura baten wathura yanne 80%yi..
oya "thamage sathuta" kathawa ape mithra ritigala jayasena kihipawarayak kiyanawa mama ahala thiyenawa.
ewani pasubimak thula eki sansidimata abhiyoga karannawun mardhanaya kirima manawa ayithiya pamanak nowa rate mulika ayithiya pawa thahawuru kirime wayamak lesa salakiya yuthuya.
eeka nisa 'mama' kiyala kenek naha.
wiyali kalagunaya pawathina kalayata ee swabhawika sansiddhiya sambandhayen udghoshanayak pawathwa lakunu kipayak damagannata wipakshaya kamathiya.
dan blog eka liyanne , ara kiyawwa wage marayada .... ....
ee atharama glayifoset thahanama nisi paridi kriyawata nagima pinisa aanduwa gena athi piyawara pramanawath nowana bawa ohu wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.
habayi, moda asli kella ada ninde athare emineta eyage katin alla ganna puluwan wenawa, hayathge kolla, murath kiyaneka.

sup eka owini wetha ragena gos, thawath wathura tikak muhune thawaru pasu, owini deneth hariyaya.
mahindage athsana na..
apa danna ithihasaya thula mema awastha dekama adu wadi pramanayangen sathya lesa sidu wi atha.
gaslabbage akkata makkada una welawe gaslabba paththakata wela balan unna wena dewal diha...
me hara bauddhayan wisin wisheshayen salakiya yuthu wu karunak da aththeya.
ee pilibandawa ma kiya athi de da pahatha dakweyi.
wipakshaya sirith paridi sama deyakin ma deshapalana wasi laba ganimata kriya kirima gana api pudumawenne naha.
gamaralatath bowela thiyenne!
sinamawath ekka thibuna sambandhaya wena paththakata giye ee widihata.obath giye wenama paththaka....?mage piya injineruwarayek.

siyawas gananak pura warshikawa dalada peraharen asirimath wu anuradhapuraye dalada madura wu dhammachakka mandiraya demahal mandirayak lesa diyunu kara dalada wahanse ehi wada hinduwa puda sathkara kala palamuwani raju lesa kithsiri mewan raju ithihasa gathawa atha.uthuru mada palath pradhana amathya es.em.ranjith samarakon mahatha anuradhapura aithihasika dalada perahara wiyaki giya dalada urumaya yali sankethawath karana maha punya karmayak lesa handunwayi.siya soyuru niyojya amathya es.em.chandrasena mahatha wisin dina 365 n akhandawa dolos mahe parithrana dharma deshanawa pawathwa deshaye aarakshawata kala aashirwadaya menma ruwanwali saradun abhiyasa dirgha kalinawa pawathwagena yana akhanda dansala da janaprasadayata lakwa athi maha pinkam bawa sandahan kara ema punya karmayan menma anuradhapura aithihasika dalada perahara akhandawa pawathwagena yamatath ehi wichithrawath bawa wardhanaya kirimatath gatha haki siyalu piyawara ganna bawath pradhana amathyawaraya sandahan karayi.
hubekje rajyayata erehiwa hamuda meheyawannata gyon hwon mulwuye ya.
dumriya papuwaruwen wati tharunayek maruta.

ema rajya bhasha panathata erehiwa fedaral pakshaye (dan ti.en.ee.) chelwanayagam sathyagrahayak parlimenthuwa idiripita pawathwu athara ema wirodhayata wirodhaya pala kirimata thawath wirodhathawayak (dan siduwannak menma) sanwidhanaya wi dibuni.
thamanwa therum gaththu gahaniyek thamanta sith wedana aragena enne naha.
eeka nam deyiyo baluwa wage une.
mama hithana widihata nam waraddak nam na.
parisaraya thulin pahadili karanawa nam, thirisan sathaku bihi wu pera kala ithihasaya kimata aapasu athithayata yama anawashya wanne ada da ema hasirima dakwana nisa ya.
ee hamadetama hitha hayiya karagena thamange swamiyage wyaparaya wadimahal puthath ekka digin digatama karagena pawulama nadaththu kala kiyala amma apith ekka kiwwa.
ape kollanta sidu wa aththe ese idiriyata yana idirigami ratawala pihita pathimata ya.
prabheda salaku kalhi dushta wrana prabheda 12k pilibandawa aayurwedaye sandahan we.
kumbha:- kumbha lagna himiyanà·™g kendraye dewannata sikuruge paminima itha subayi.
api okkoma lankawe minissu kiyana eka amathaka welaâ€¦
kalin post eketh kiyanna bari una..
â€sirima me mahathwaru the bonne sini dalayi.
karishma aayeth sanje ekka pataleyida?
mehi prathipalayak lesa daruwage molaye manasika kriyawan saha samajagathawima palanaya karana snayu paddhathi awul wiyawul wi yayi.
oba yam prashnayakata madiwi sitiyath, oba aduma gane ee prashnayen goda eemata satan kala haki thathwayaka ho sitinawa noweda?
mama danagaththa, sadde nathuwa iddi monawa hari kotakota thamayi inne.

ithin eelanga thathparaye mage jiwithaye monawa sidu wedayi nishchithawa kiwa sitha gatha nohaki asiru thanakata ma pathwi sitiyemi.me yanne kohedayi denuwangen asannata uwamana winida eyata mata diriyak nowiya.ma me sitinne mage jiwithaye ma wadiyenma prema karana pudgalaya langa bawa sabawaki.eeth ohuta ma thawath eka kellek pamanak bawa sithannata karunu misa ese nosithannata ma langa kisima sakshiyak natha.murugasan warusawak mada depasin aawaranaya kala thun sak riyak thula monawa siddha wannata barida ..?lokaya monawa kiwada denuwan mage hadawathe sadahatama nikalalya..
me wana wita aluthgama jana jiwithaya sampurnayenma adala wi athi athara muslim sinhala siyalu dena pasuwanne biyeni.
wada karayo enna.
- mema adawiya wasa damannata thiranaya kalemi.
ehema kalu nandage duwala mama dannawa.
kathanayakawaraya ada (22) parlimenthuwe di kathanayaka niwedanaya idiripath karamin pawasi ya.
ayi deyiyane meka nathuwa mama awuradu 2k thisse mona dukak windada...?
dan mata ee gana wenath sithiwili aththeya.
thama katha karanne kopayakin menma, ichchua bhangathwayak pilibanda hangimakin bawa ohu kiya.
me rate siwil samajaya athulu paà·Šragathishilin mulikathwaya gena 2015 di parajaya kala balawega pasugiya da kolambaa aawe.
me aanduwatath kiyanawa eewa athugalama danna kiyala.
hugak eewayi magin nathara wenawane ithin.
me dewalin minissunge awul wechcha hith awulen awulata path karanawa wina sanasillak, aswasillak wenne naâ€¦.

judewwarun babiloniye wisima 1 judahi raja wu jehoyakimge rajya kalayehi thun wana awurudde di babiloniye raja wu nebukadneshar raja jerusalama aakramanaya kota eya watalagaththe ya. 2 samindanan wahanse ohuge athata judawe raja wu jehoyakim pawa dun seka; ohu samanga dewiyan wahansege maligawe badu bahiradiya samaharak da pawa dun seka.
ema ekathuwa ohu mana lesa sammishranaya karayi.
eka dakkama mathak wuna jiwana kusalatha walata hathe panthiyedi karapu "pranitha rasathi the koppayak sadamu" kiyana padama...
ee nisa ema samagamwala paà·Šradhanin ekathu karala me pilibanda samalochanayak karala me wadakatayuthu ikmanin awasan karanna balaporoththu wenawaâ€ yanuwen amathiwaraya kiya sitiyeya.
** ** maniyan gana wishwase thiyapan.

soldadu unnahe idiripath karanne pradhana samaja dharawen nerapa pituwahal karanu labu athamwita owunge konwima nisama ekineka matha yapena ekinekata senehasa dakwana pudgalayin satharadenaku pilibandawaya.

kalayage awamen bihi wu kumaruwan dedena upathissa (sari nam brahmana kula kumariyage puth) saha kolitha (moggali kula kumariyage puth) washayen nam wiya.

api aththa washayenma kalpana karala baluwoth me mihipita jiwath wana sama kenekutama manushyayekuta pamanak noweyi.
ithin parakku wenna epa.

shri nishshanka mahatha pakshaya aarambha kirime yojanawa idiripath kaleya.shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mulika prathama karyaya wanne adhirajyawadinta ha owunge hawulkarayan wana deshiya dhanapathi panthiyata wiruddhawa satan meheyawima yayi nishshanka mahatha siya kathawedi sandahan kaleya.pakshaya aarambha kala yojanawa sthira kale gampola sahira widyalaye widuhalpathiwa siti alhaj baduddin mahamud mahathaya.
don pilip da silwa aapa appuhami, siya mulika adhyapanaya laba gaththe game wiharasthanaye welagedara siridhammadassi himipanan ge asureni.
(bhandagara bandumkara horakama thahawuru wuwahoth eya watbadu sorakamata wada ihala agayak ganneya.)

eeniya shasthriya lokaye wadiya inne dewani thunwani ganaye aya.

diyawadiya rogiyekuta prathikara kirimedi ma sidu karanne durwalawi thibena agnayashaya suwapath karana ekayi.agnayashaya suwapath kalawita emagin insiyulin niyamitha aakarayata nipadawanawa.ewita swabhawikawama rudhiraye glukos pariwuththiya sidu wenawa.eya thamayi diyawadiyawa nittawatama suwakarana sarthaka kramaya.

ee loka bankuwa wisin shri lankawa ihala madhyama aadayam kandayata wargikaranaya kirimen wasarakata pasuwa wima wisheshathwayak. 2020-2021 warshayan sandaha wana ratawal wala aadayam mattama anuwa loka bankuwa wisin mema wargikaranaya sidukota thibenawa.

aththatama ayiye oyage watina kalayath shramayath waya karagena me liyapu lipiyanam behewinma sarthakayi.ee wagema liyala thiyena aakarayath godak saralayi pahadiliyi..me wage lipi apith samaga bedagannawata oyata godak pin.me gana mama mita kalin danagena hitiye naha..me lipiyen thamayi danagaththe..

eda ese nosita dan udahas wuwata palak natha.anagatha dakmak nomathi sanghayan wahanselagen lakmawata awasi natha.

paththara pitu 20 k thibenam ada ee siyallenma jathiwadaya wapurana bawath aduma ganane pitu 10 kin oonama mathayak kiya ithiri pitu 10 n aanduwe mathayata idak diya yuthu yayida janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.
adu padiyata aduwen wada kara gaththada ema adu padiya thawath kappadu kara wada pramanayada thawath wadi kalahoth eya oroththu dena thaththwayak wewida?
namuth eya anuwarthanaya karana lada ladaru pothak ho garbhani sangarawaki.
